item.description:
This will be the very first Meetup for The Grafton Pug Meetup Group!

We'll use the time to get to know each other, talk about being Pug Owners, and discuss what we want out of our Meetups.

******A receipt of current vaccinations must be brought with you in order to enter the play area (kennel rules)*********

Donations will be accepted to help support this new pug meetup!
Thank you all and I look forward to meeting all you pug lovers out there! =)
item.name: The Grafton Pug May Meetup
